text: Marjorie Anthony Linden (October 10, 1935 â€“ April 1, 2013) was a Canadian broadcaster and media executive. She achieved multiple "firsts" for women in broadcasting, including being the first all-night woman disc jockey in Montreal, the first woman vice-president in the Canadian television industry, and the first female president of the Broadcast Executive Society. title: Marjorie Anthony Linden
